translation.en: Yeah, there's been a bad car accident.
translation.es: Sí, hubo un accidente de tránsito.

translation.en: We're about two miles off the freeway.
translation.es: A tres kilómetros de la autopista.

translation.en: She's got a punctured lung. Get her into Operating Room B.
translation.es: Paciente con perforación pulmonar.Al quirófano B.

translation.en: Appears to be in her late 20s, car accident.
translation.es: Parece tener más de 20 años,accidente de autos.

translation.en: I'll love you forever and a day.
translation.es: Te amaré por siempre y más.

translation.en: She's going into v-tach. She's unstable.
Tell B to have a crash cart ready. We need to start compression.
translation.es: Preparen el desfibrilador.Hay que empezar la compresión.

translation.en: How much longer are we waiting? Coming through.
Excuse me. I'm looking for my wife.
translation.es: Hola. Disculpe, busco a mi esposa.

translation.en: I'm Russell Williams. I got a call. My wife Jennifer was in a car accident.
translation.es: Soy Russell Williams. Me llamaron.Mi esposa tuvo un accidente.

translation.en: She's in the OR, sir. I'm sorry.
No, you can't go in there! Mr. Williams!
translation.es: No puede entrar. Señor Williams.Llama a seguridad.

translation.en: Get another amp of epi. Charge again.
translation.es: Otra ampolla de epinefrina.Vuelve a cargar.

translation.en: Give me a reading. Pulse is 75, pressure's 90 over 70.
translation.es: - Bien, dime los signos.- Pulso 75. Presión 90/70.

translation.en: Nice work, everyone. Let's prep for surgery.
I'm sorry, you can't be here.
I was wondering if there's an update.
Okay, did she say anything to anyone about what happened?
translation.es: Bueno, pero ¿habló con alguiensobre lo que pasó?

translation.en: has had a lot of internal bleeding on her brain...
It's possible she won't remember anything.
translation.es: Es posible que no recuerde nada.

translation.en: If anything changes, I'll let you know.

translation.es: Sr. Williams, su esposa salió de cirugía.

translation.en: your wife's out of surgery. She hasn't regained consciousness yet,
translation.es: Sr. Williams, su esposa salió de cirugía. Aún no despertó,

translation.en: but if you want, I'll take you up to Recovery to see her.
translation.es: pero puedo acompañarloa la sala de recuperación.

translation.en: I want you to know that I'm here and I'm not gonna leave, no matter what. Okay?
translation.es: Solo quiero que sepas que estoy aquíy no me iré, pase lo que pase.

translation.en: They grow up so fast, don't they?
-You gotta enjoy it while it lasts. -Mm.
Oh, excuse me for a second.
I can be there in - what? - 45.
I'll take the bear as well.
Look, he's getting a big bear.
So they said they found Jennifer at a rest stop?
translation.es: ¿Dijeron que la encontraronen un área de descanso?
Saliendo de la 33,cerca del Cañón Brubaker.

translation.en: When was the last time you saw her?
That night, she went out to get groceries, said she wanted to cook dinner.
translation.es: Esa noche. Salió a comprar,dijo que quería cocinar.

translation.en: No, I waited about an hour, and...
I tried to call her cell phone. She didn't answer,
and then I called the store,
they said they hadn't seen her.
translation.es: y dijeron que no la habían visto.

translation.en: Have you been having problems at home, you and Jennifer?
I'm trying to piece together what your wife was doing
at a rest area with no ID.
translation.es: en un área de descanso sin identificación.

translation.en: Alone, in the middle of the night.
translation.es: Sola, en medio de la noche.

translation.en: And I'd love to know the same thing.
But we had just gotten married,
we had just moved to the mountains.
When your wife went to the store, did she take her car?
translation.es: Cuando su esposa fue a la tienda,¿fue en su auto?

translation.en: I'll start with a report on the car and see what happens.
translation.es: Informaré la desaparicióny veremos qué pasa.

translation.en: I would love to talk to your wife when she's able.
translation.es: Me encantaría hablarcon su esposa cuando pueda.

translation.en: I hope she gets better soon.
Female, African-American, ten years of age.
You're a cop. Why can't you find your own daughter?
translation.es: Eres policía.¿Por qué no encuentras a tu propia hija?

translation.en: Police have no leads on the disappearance of ten-year old Hannah Page.
translation.es: La policía no tiene pistas sobre la desapariciónde Hannah Page, de diez años.

translation.en: We'll continue to run extensive CTs,
but you should know, the damage to your wife's hippocampus was severe.
translation.es: pero debe saberque sufrió severos daños en el hipocampo.

translation.en: And what does that mean exactly?
While she'll retain a great deal of her semantic memory -
translation.es: Aunque conservarágran parte de la memoria semántica:

translation.en: episodic recall is far less reliable.
translation.es: es probable que no recuerde sucesos.

translation.en: But she'll know who I am, right?
We'll do everything to aid her-- Okay, to aid her.
translation.es: - Vamos a hacer lo posible para ayudarla.- Sí, para ayudarla.

translation.en: Are you saying my wife doesn't remember me?
translation.es: ¿Dice que mi esposa no me recuerda?
- Es posible.- No me hable de posibilidades.

translation.en: Does my wife know who I am or not?
translation.es: ¿Mi esposa sabe quién soy o no?

translation.en: We're going to get her there, I promise you.
translation.es: Pero la ayudaremos a que lo haga.

translation.en: Your husband's here to see you.
-I'll be down the hall if you need me. -Thanks.
translation.es: - Estaré al final del pasillo.- Gracias.

translation.en: pretty overwhelmed. I'll just sit right over here, okay?
You were in an accident, and you hit your head.
translation.es: Tuviste un accidentey te golpeaste la cabeza.

translation.en: Really hard. Remember any of that?
Jennifer, do you know who I am?
You don't remember me, do you?
Look, the doctor said that there are going to be...
translation.es: Mira, el doctor dijo que algunas cosas

translation.en: some things that are harder to remember than others.
translation.es: serán más fáciles de recordar que otras.

translation.en: I'm going to be right here with you, I promise.
translation.es: Voy a estar aquí contigo,lo prometo.
Sí. Lo vamos a hacer juntos.

translation.en: I don't even know your name.
It's really nice to meet you.
Look, I already told the other guy--
translation.es: Mira, ya le dije al otro tipo...

translation.en: I don't care about them. You're talking to me now.
translation.es: No me importa. Hablas conmigo ahora.

translation.en: I don't know. It was dark, it was raining.
I just wanted to get home.
I didn't see her until it was too late.
translation.es: Cuando la vi, ya era tarde.

translation.en: That's not why I brought you in.
I wanna know if you saw anyone else there.
translation.es: Quiero saber si viste a alguien más.

translation.en: How about other cars in the parking lot? Did you see any?
Now you mention it, there was...
I think it was pulling a car.
translation.es: Sí, creo que remolcaba un auto.

translation.en: Yeah, with a hauling winch, a cable.
translation.es: Sí, como con un cabrestante,un cable.

translation.en: I remember thinking it was kinda strange.
Did you see where the truck went?
No. It was already gone when the ambulance arrived.
translation.es: No. Había desaparecidopara cuando llegó la ambulancia.

translation.en: He didn't say anything about a pickup truck before.
translation.es: No dijo nada de una camioneta antes.

translation.en: The brain trust in Traffic didn't ask.
translation.es: Porque el confianzudo de tránsitono le preguntó.

translation.en: She either drove herself there, someone stole her car,
translation.es: Es así, condujo hasta allí,alguien robó su auto o alguien la dejó.

translation.en: or she was dropped off. Either way, someone else was there.
translation.es: Es así, condujo hasta allí,alguien robó su auto o alguien la dejó. Como sea, había alguien más.

translation.en: -I know what week this is, Frank. -Don't.
translation.es: - Sé qué semana es, Frank.- No.

translation.en: Whatever you do won't make up for what happened.
translation.es: Lo que hagas no compensará lo que pasó.

translation.en: Scratches and bruises on her wrists. They were defensive wounds.
translation.es: Tiene rasguños y moretones en la muñeca.Eso es defensa.

translation.en: It also said they could've been caused in the collision.
I'll see if the drivers saw this truck.
translation.es: Llamaré a los testigospara ver si vieron la camioneta.

translation.en: Look at you. When's the last time you took a day off?
translation.es: Mírate. ¿Cuándo fue tu último día libre?

translation.en: I'm not a beach kind of guy.
One of the accident witnesses is waiting for you upfront.
Thanks, Charlie. Can you bring him back?
Sorry, Sean. You're not getting rid of me that easily.
translation.es: Lo siento, Sean. No te librarás de mí tan fácil.

translation.en: If you're gonna run with this, make sure it's for the right reason.
translation.es: Si vas a seguir con esto,que sea por la razón correcta.

translation.en: Mr. Kahn, thanks for coming in.
And eventually, I worked up the nerve to ask you out.
translation.es: Y al final, me atreví a invitarte a salir.

translation.en: You wanted to go to one of those Japanese places
translation.es: Y querías ir a un lugar japonés.

translation.en: where they cook in front of you, they do the knife tricks.
translation.es: Esos donde cocinan frente a tiy hacen trucos con cuchillos.
Los de los volcanes de cebolla.

translation.en: I was so nervous, and I was so worried about impressing you
that I neglected to tell you I was allergic to shellfish.
translation.es: que me olvidé de decirteque era alérgico a los mariscos.

translation.en: They cook everything on that griddle.
It's not that funny, it's not funny at all...
translation.es: - No es tan gracioso...- Un poco sí.

translation.en: 'cause I blew up like a blimp.
I forgot to ask. Have you talked to my parents?
translation.es: No te pregunté.¿Hablaste con mis padres?

translation.en: They must be worried. They haven't heard from me.
Honey, they passed away... a couple of years ago.
Yeah, there was a fire, and...
-Sorry. -If you don't mind, I need a moment alone.
translation.es: Lo siento. Disculpa, necesito estar sola.

translation.en: Yeah, of course. I'll just be right outside here.
translation.es: Sí, claro. Voy a estar ahí afuera.

translation.en: I'm here about the young woman that was in that accident two nights ago, off Route 33.
translation.es: Vine por la joven que tuvo un accidentehace unas noches en la ruta 33.

translation.en: Miss Williams is only seeing family members at the moment.
translation.es: La señorita Williamssolo puede ver a sus familiares.

translation.en: At least see that Miss Williams gets these.
translation.es: ¿Puede hacerque la Srta. Williams las reciba?
Jennifer, vas a lastimar a alguien.

translation.en: I want you to keep up your memory games.
translation.es: Sigue con los juegos de memoria.

translation.en: They're just as important as your physical rehab.
translation.es: Son tan importantescomo tu rehabilitación física.

translation.en: Your CT came back, from yesterday.
translation.es: Llegó el resultado de la tomografía.

translation.en: It shows improvement. It's not going to happen overnight.
translation.es: Muestra mejoría.Pero no será de la noche a la mañana.

translation.en: I wanna make sure that you're--
I won't overdo it. I promise.
I'm sending you home with a cane, too. I want you to use it to walk.
translation.es: Te daré un bastón. Úsalo para caminar.
- Dos o tres minutos por día.- Bien.

translation.en: Hey... as the memory comes back,
translation.es: Oye. Es normal estar confundida al principio.

translation.en: it's normal for wires to get crossed.
translation.es: Es normal estar confundida al principio.

translation.en: -I just need a little help, actually. -One, two, three...
translation.es: - Ayúdame un poco.- Uno, dos, tres...

translation.en: Hey, it's gonna be okay, alright?
It's been in the family a while.
translation.es: Hace tiempo que es de la familia.

translation.en: We moved in right before the wedding.
translation.es: Sí, nos mudamos antes de la boda.

translation.en: Go ahead. Feel free. Go check it out.
And this is the best part about living out here.
translation.es: Y esta es la mejor parte de vivir aquí.

translation.en: Oh... I wish you could remember our wedding night. We never even left this room.
translation.es: Ojalá recordaras nuestra noche de bodas.No salimos de esta habitación.

translation.en: Wait till you see the backyard.
I still can't believe this is really our house.
translation.es: No puedo creer que sea nuestra casa.

translation.en: it's been in the family for a while.
I mean, it's been fixed up and added onto over the years, but...
translation.es: La fueron remodelando con los años.

translation.en: Nearest neighbor is over a mile away.
translation.es: El vecino más cercanoestá a un kilómetro.

translation.en: Now, if you grab a bottle of wine,
translation.es: Si tomas una botella de vino

translation.en: sit in these chairs right over here, you can catch one hell of a sunset.
translation.es: y te sientas allí, verás un atardecer increíble.

translation.en: So I was thinking I'll probably start you out in the guest bedroom down here.
translation.es: Pensé que podrías empezarpor la habitación de invitados.

translation.en: -It's closer to the kitchen-- -No special treatment.
translation.es: La cocina está cerca. - No quiero nada especial.- Lo sé.

translation.en: I got it, but I just don't want you to overdo it.
translation.es: - No quiero nada especial.- Lo sé. Pero no quiero que te exijas.

translation.en: I need us to get back to our old routine.
-I'll go get the rest of your stuff. -Thanks.

translation.es: - Soy yo.- Soy el detective Page.

translation.en: Could you just hold on for one second?
I'll step out, see if I can get a better signal.
translation.es: Saldré a ver si tengo mejor señal.

translation.en: How's it going? Any luck finding the car?
but I've talked to a couple of drivers who stopped to help your wife.
translation.es: pero hablé con algunos conductoresque ayudaron a su esposa.

translation.en: Well, two of them thought they saw a white pickup truck
translation.es: Bueno, dos de ellos dicenque vieron una camioneta blanca

translation.en: leave the scene of the accident.
translation.es: irse de la escena del accidente.

translation.en: One of them thought that it might've been pulling your wife's car.
translation.es: Uno dijo que parecía que remolcabael auto de su esposa.

translation.en: Well, the other thinks that he saw the plates.
translation.es: Bueno, el otrocree que vio las placas.

translation.en: But in the meantime, I'd really love it if your wife could come down to the station tomorrow.
translation.es: Pero mientras tanto, me encantaríaque su esposa viniera mañana aquí.

translation.en: Look, we literally just got home,
translation.es: Mire, acabamos de llegar a casa,

translation.en: and the last thing I want to do is overwhelm her.
translation.es: y lo último que quiero haceres abrumarla.

translation.en: Mr. Williams, we promise to take it easy on her.
translation.es: Sr. Williams,prometo que iremos con calma.

translation.en: Yeah, 11:00 is great. Let's do that.
translation.es: Sí, a las 11:00 suena bien.Allí estaremos.

translation.en: -What's tomorrow at 11:00? -Huh? I overheard you outside on the phone.
translation.es: ¿Qué hay mañana a las 11:00?Te escuché hablar por teléfono.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. That was work calling.
Wondering when I was coming back.
I told them we just got home, and there's no way I'll rush your recovery.
translation.es: Les dije que acabamos de llegary que no apuraría tu recuperación.

translation.en: Are they okay with me taking time off?
Honey, actually, you quit your job when we moved out here.
translation.es: Cariño, dejaste tu trabajocuando nos mudamos aquí.

translation.en: We'd decided we wanted to start a family
translation.es: Sí, habíamos habladode formar una familia

translation.en: and this was the best way to do it, came out here for the fresh air,
translation.es: y esta era la mejor forma de hacerlo,venir aquí por aire fresco

translation.en: What about friends? I must have friends.
Since the move, we don't see them as much as we used to.
translation.es: Aunque, desde la mudanza,no los vemos tanto como antes.

translation.en: I spoke to Nancy when we were leaving the hospital.
translation.es: Hablé con Nancycuando salíamos del hospital.

translation.en: I asked if she'd let everybody know.
translation.es: Le dije que le avisara a los demás.

translation.en: She and Jason will visit once they get back from Hawaii.
translation.es: Vendrán a visitartecuando regresen de Hawái.

translation.en: Oh. Maybe I should reach out to them, too.
translation.es: Quizá debería acercarme a ellos también.

translation.en: It might bring back some memories.
Have the police found my phone?
Next time I'm out, I'll just pick you up a new one.
Why were you asking about Jennifer Williams?
Russell, there's someone in the backyard!
You were out late. Yeah, I couldn't sleep.
translation.es: - Estuviste afuera anoche.- Sí, no podía dormir.

translation.en: I think I'm gonna head into town today, grab a few things. I'll grab you that phone.
translation.es: Hoy iré al pueblo a buscar algunas cosasy te conseguiré un teléfono.

translation.en: I feel like I need to take a look around.
translation.es: Siento que necesito mirar un poco todo.

translation.en: Maybe something will trigger my memory.
translation.es: No sé, tal vez algo active mi memoria.

translation.en: I told you it'd all come back.
Charlie. How many white pickup trucks do you think there are in the county?
translation.es: Charlie. ¿Cuántas camionetas blancascrees que hay en el condado?

translation.en: Is anyone waiting upfront for me?
Actually, I think I've been stood up.
translation.es: En realidad,creo que me dejaron plantado.

translation.en: Hey, it's Russell. I can't come to the phone right now.
translation.es: Te comunicaste con Russell.No puedo atender.

translation.en: Leave a message, I'll call back.
translation.es: Deja tu mensaje y te llamaré.

translation.en: Run a trace on this number. I'm going out.
translation.es: Rastrea este número. Tengo que salir.

translation.en: I ran a search on our database for Russell Williams,
translation.es: Busqué a Russell Williamsen la base de datos,

translation.en: Do you mind searching for the contact info he gave you?
translation.es: ¿Podría darmelos datos de contacto que dio?

translation.en: This is the address that he gave us.
translation.es: Esta es la dirección que nos dio.

translation.en: Er, will you do me a favor?
When you speak to her, please have her call
translation.es: Si habla con ella, ¿puede decirle que llamepara una cita de seguimiento?
¿puede decirle que llamepara una cita de seguimiento?

translation.en: Every time I've called it's gone straight to voicemail.
translation.es: Cada vez que llamo,va directo a la casilla.

translation.en: Did Miss Williams ever mention a white pickup truck?

translation.es: - ¿Por qué?- Es una pregunta, nada más.
- Gracias por su ayuda.- Está bien.

translation.en: I'll love you forever and a day.
translation.es: Te amaré por siempre y más.

translation.en: Look at you, made it down the steps.
I was just exploring. Seeing if anything felt familiar.
translation.es: Quería explorara ver si algo me resultaba familiar.

translation.en: I had them set that up for you.
While you were wandering, anything come back to you?
-I'd like to talk to Jennifer Williams. -Who?
I was told she lived here with her husband Russell.
translation.es: Me dijeron que vivía aquícon su esposo Russell.

translation.en: Someone gave you the wrong information.
It's just me and my husband.
And you've never heard of a Russell or Jennifer Williams?
translation.es: ¿Y nunca oyó hablarde Russell o Jennifer Williams?
- Departamento del Sheriff.- Hola, soy yo.

translation.en: Looks like Russell Williams gave the hospital the wrong address.
translation.es: Parece que Williamsdio una dirección equivocada.

translation.en: Maybe he just made a mistake on the forms.
Did anyone actually run the victim's prints?
How did they find him to let him know she was hurt?
That's the thing. I asked, but... nobody remembered calling anyone.
translation.es: Es curioso. Pregunté, pero...nadie recuerda haberlo llamado.

translation.en: I don't suppose you got a trace on the number I gave you?
translation.es: No tienes rastrodel número que te di, ¿no?

translation.en: We tried to trace it using GPS, but there's no signal.
translation.es: Intentamos rastrearlo con el GPS,pero no tiene señal.

translation.en: Nurse Masters said, as memories come back,
translation.es: La enfermeradijo que cuando regresen los recuerdos,

translation.en: All the memories are gonna come back.
We've got every day from now, the rest of our lives to make new ones.
translation.es: Y tenemos toda la vida por delantepara hacer nuevos.

translation.en: Look, maybe I just need more time.
Oh for God's sake, Jen. I am your husband.
translation.es: ¡Por amor de Dios, Jen!Soy tu esposo.

translation.en: I sat in that damn waiting room
translation.es: Estuve en esa maldita sala de esperanoche tras noche

translation.en: night after night, because I couldn't stand not being there when you woke up.
translation.es: Estuve en esa maldita sala de esperanoche tras noche porque no podía soportarno estar ahí cuando despertaras.

translation.en: I was there at every step of your recovery and this is what I get?
translation.es: Estuve en toda tu recuperación,¿y obtengo esto?

translation.en: -A wife who won't let me touch her? -You're hurting me.
translation.es: - Una esposa que no me deja tocarla.- Me duele.

translation.en: White Oaks ER. Nurse Masters, Detective Page.
translation.es: - Hospital White Oaks.- Enfermera. Detective Page.

translation.en: can you pull up your surveillance cameras from your parking lot
translation.es: ¿me conseguiría el videode la cámara del estacionamiento
Claro. Se la pediré a seguridad.

translation.en: White pickup truck with a winch.
translation.es: Una camioneta blanca con un cabrestante.

translation.en: Got those real estate records you asked for.
That house has belonged to Clark and Ruth Gibson since 1976.
translation.es: La casa pertenecea Clark y Ruth Gibson desde 1976.

translation.en: Now go home, before Samantha blames me.
translation.es: Ahora vete a casaantes de que Samantha me culpe.

translation.en: -I'll tell her you say hi. -Please do.
translation.es: - Le daré tus saludos.- Por favor.

translation.en: Security just pulled the video file.
They'll email it over to you.
If you need anything else, let me know.
how did Russell prove he was her husband?
It says here in the doctor's notes
translation.es: En las notas del doctor,figura que mostró fotos familiares

translation.en: that he showed some family photos and identified a back tattoo.
translation.es: En las notas del doctor,figura que mostró fotos familiares e identificó un tatuaje.

translation.en: -Thank you for all your help. -Sorry, Detective.
translation.es: Gracias por su ayuda. Lo siento, detective.

translation.en: Thanks so much. Have a good night.
You always used to have a bunch of these around the office, so we...
translation.es: Siempre tenías de estasen la oficina, así que...

translation.en: actually planted a special plot out there for you.
What I said last night was not fair.
translation.es: Lo que dije anoche fue injusto.

translation.en: And it just... It got away from me.
If you want to take it slow, we will take it slow, absolutely.
translation.es: Si quieres ir despacio, iremos despacio.

translation.en: I want you to be comfortable.
-What can I do for you? -Whoa, man. Did that hurt?
translation.es: Hola. ¿En qué puedo ayudarte? Vaya. ¿Te dolió?

translation.en: Why? You looking to get some silver? Maybe one of these conches?
translation.es: ¿Por qué?¿Te gustaría hacerte uno de estos?

translation.en: -Yeah. You do them? -I can do anything you want.
Can you tell me what that means?
I got a hit on Jennifer's maiden name.
She shared a house with her parents down in San Jose.
translation.es: Vivía con sus padres en San José.

translation.en: I'm on my way there now.
No, not really. I was gonna ask you the same thing.
translation.es: En realidad, no.Iba a preguntarte lo mismo.

translation.en: How about we do a romantic dinner tonight?
translation.es: ¿Y si hacemosuna cena romántica esta noche?

translation.en: Do you mind going out and grabbing some groceries?
Not at all. I'd be happy to.
Yeah. Do you want white or red?
-Better get red if it's Italian. -Red it is.
translation.es: - Tinto para las pastas.- Tinto será.

translation.en: I'll be right back. Drive safe.
Jennifer and Russell? They left the company before the wedding.
translation.es: ¿Jennifer y Russell?Renunciaron justo antes de la boda.

translation.en: That was about two months ago.
They were the big office couple.
translation.es: Eran la pareja de la oficina.

translation.en: HR usually frowns on that kind of thing,
translation.es: RR. HH. no suele permitir eso,

translation.en: but they were cute together. What you gonna do?
translation.es: pero hacían una linda pareja.¿Qué más da?

translation.en: Those are from the corporate retreat last year.
translation.es: Esas son del retiro corporativodel año pasado.

translation.en: That's the happy couple right there.

translation.es: Si ese es Russell, ¿quién es él?

translation.en: What's this all about anyway? Are they in some kind of trouble?
translation.es: ¿De qué se trata todo esto? ¿Están en problemas?

translation.en: Not for the last couple of months.
translation.es: Hace algunos meses que ya no.

translation.en: He and his supervisor had a little disagreement.
translation.es: Él y su supervisortuvieron un pequeño desacuerdo.

translation.en: Broke his nose in three places.
translation.es: Le rompió la nariz en tres.

translation.en: Ryan's a smart guy, but he's got a hell of a temper.
I'm gonna need all the contact info you can give me.
translation.es: Necesito todos los datos de contactoque tenga.

translation.en: after they left, I found a little note that Russell wrote to Jennifer, buried in her desk.
translation.es: cuando se fueron, encontré una notade Russell para Jennifer en su escritorio.

translation.en: It's yours if you think it might help.
translation.es: Se la daré si la necesita.

translation.en: I'll love you forever and a day.
translation.es: Te amaré por siempre y más.

translation.en: How can we have no Internet?
You took a hell of a fall.
Oh, sweetheart, that doesn't look good at all.
translation.es: Cariño, eso no se ve nada bien.

translation.en: What did you think was gonna happen?
Roaming around in the yard in your condition?
translation.es: ¿Caminando por el jardín en tu estado?

translation.en: -What were you doing out there? -What's going on?
Wait. What did you do to my phone?

translation.es: - No te alteres tanto. Escucha.- No...

translation.en: -I don't want to rest! -You need to. It'll be good for you.
translation.es: - Descansa.- No quiero. Debes hacerlo. Te hará bien.

translation.en: Okay. Now give that about 20 minutes,
and I promise you, you won't feel any more pain, okay?
translation.es: y te prometo que no sentirás más dolor.

translation.en: -What do you mean? -What did you do with my husband?
translation.es: - ¿Qué quieres decir?- ¿Qué le hiciste a mi esposo?

translation.en: After everything that I have done for you,
translation.es: Después de todo lo que hice por ti,

translation.en: I hoped that by now, you'd give me a little more gratitude.
translation.es: esperaba que a esta alturaestuvieras más agradecida.

translation.en: Just stay right here. I'm gonna get some work done.
translation.es: Quédate aquí. Debo encargarme de algo.

translation.en: Everything's gonna be fine, I promise. Wait...
translation.es: - Todo estará bien, te lo prometo.- Espera...

translation.en: I've tried to call you to start physical therapy.
That's so funny. Jennifer and I were saying how we hadn't heard from you.
translation.es: Esta mañana hablamosde que no sabíamos nada de usted.

translation.en: Frankly, I've been concerned as well. None of the numbers that you gave us work.
translation.es: Y yo también estoy preocupada. Ninguno de los números funciona.

translation.en: No, I probably got a number crossed somewhere.
I really appreciate your help, thank you, but she's doing great.
translation.es: De verdad aprecio su ayuda,gracias, pero está muy bien.

translation.en: -I'm gonna call the detective. -Get away from my car.
-You're back. -I ran into Nurse Masters while I was out.
translation.es: - Volviste.- Me encontré con la enfermera.

translation.en: She asked how you were doing.
How are we doing by the way?
Hey, we're actually busy right now.
It'd be great if you could come back another time.
Can you open up the gate?
There's a door in the back.
We are really starting to have some trust issues here, aren't we?
Please, tell me who you are!
The sooner you realize that, the better everything will be, I promise.
translation.es: Cuanto antes lo recuerdes,mejor será todo, lo prometo.

translation.en: If that leg is ever gonna get better, you're gonna have to stay off it.
translation.es: Si quieres que la pierna mejore,tendrás que quedarte tranquila.

translation.en: Okay? Promise me you'll stay off it.
I promise I'll stay off of it.
translation.es: Te... prometo que me quedaré tranquila.

translation.en: Do you have any idea what I have done for you?
translation.es: ¿Te das una ideade todo lo que hice por ti?

translation.en: We're here live with the talented and incredibly sexy--
translation.es: Estamos en vivocon la talentosa e increíblemente sexy...

translation.en: Excuse me... intelligent and utterly amazing.
I don't know why I try anymore.
translation.es: Ya no sé para qué sigo intentando.

translation.en: was for you to love me,
and for you to know how much I love you.
I would've given up my entire world just to be a part of yours.
translation.es: Hubiera renunciado a todo mi mundosolo para ser parte del tuyo.

translation.en: Please. Whatever you want me to do, I'll do it.
translation.es: Por favor. Haré lo que quieras.Dime qué quieres.

translation.en: it's not up to us now, is it?
Wait. We don't have to pretend anymore. Or lie.
translation.es: Espera. Ya no tenemos que mentir.

translation.en: I know, and it's not your fault.
translation.es: Sé que no es tu culpa.

translation.en: Do you know how many years I spent working with you in that office?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuántos añostrabajé contigo en esa oficina?

translation.en: And all for the great Russell Williams to come along... and take what was mine.
translation.es: Y todo para que el gran Russell Williamsviniera y tomara lo que era mío.

translation.en: I know you better than anyone else.
I'm the one that you should be with, not him.
translation.es: Debías estar conmigo, no con él.

translation.en: I took care of anyone that could get in my way.
translation.es: Me ocupé de quienes pudieran interponerse.

translation.en: I probably would have killed you, too, but...

translation.es: El destino jugó a mi favor.

translation.en: Now, with a clean slate, I could give you the life that you always deserved.
translation.es: Ahora, con este nuevo comienzo,podría darte la vida que te mereces.

translation.en: We can start a new life together, you and me.
translation.es: Podemos empezaruna nueva vida juntos, tú y yo.

translation.en: I'm really starting to feel unappreciated.
translation.es: Siento que no me aprecias demasiado.

translation.en: You know, I've been... thinking about what you said before.
translation.es: Estuve pensando en lo que dijiste antes.

translation.en: I never knew you felt that way about me.
translation.es: Jamás supe que sentías eso por mí.

translation.en: Well, whether you know it or not,
I've always been looking out for you.
Why didn't you ever say anything?
Russell, you never gave us a chance.
translation.es: Russell, nunca nos diste la oportunidad.

translation.en: I can see how much you care about me now.
translation.es: Ahora puedo ver cuánto me quieres.

translation.en: And I have been such a burden.
translation.es: Y sé que fui una carga.

translation.en: No, you haven't been a burden.
How are you? Can I get you anything?
Honey, we're all alone out here.
Why did it have to be like this?
Why couldn't you just be happy?
You couldn't let us be happy, could you?
to spend the rest of my days playing golf and dating divorcees.
translation.es: A pasar el resto de mis díassaliendo con divorciadas.

translation.en: Going back down to San Jose?
Yeah. I just wanted to say goodbye before I left.
translation.es: Sí. Quería despedirme antes de partir.

translation.en: I went to your old office and your boss gave me this.
translation.es: Fui a tu antigua oficina,y tu jefe me dio esto.

translation.en: I would have brought it to the hospital,
translation.es: Lo habría llevado al hospital,pero ya te habían dado el alta.

translation.en: but the nurse said you were already discharged.
translation.es: Lo habría llevado al hospital,pero ya te habían dado el alta. PARA MI QUERIDA JENNIFER

translation.en: Jennifer, I know it's probably silly writing you a little note like this,
translation.es: Jennifer, sé que es tontoescribirte una nota así,

translation.en: knowing we're about to spend the rest of our lives together,
translation.es: sabiendo que pasaremosel resto de nuestras vidas juntos,

translation.en: but I just wanted you to know that regardless of what happens next,
translation.es: pero quería que supierasque, sin importar lo que pase después,

translation.en: are the happiest memories I could ever ask for.
translation.es: es el recuerdo más felizque podría pedir.

translation.en: Not only for who you are, but for who I am when I'm with you.
translation.es: No solo por lo que eres,sino por lo que soy cuando estoy contigo.

translation.en: I'll love you forever and a day.
translation.es: Te amaré por siempre y más.
